entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
